Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Never had an issue here. Everyone is helpful! Staff is quick to help and all isles are neat and tidy.

Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: A store where you can find quick pick items. Store is best used for its great pharmacy. Fast and helpful service. Usually get the flu shot here every year. Like the program that when you buy a shot, a person in need will get a shot. Seems like a great deal! Use to find gnome statues here, but not so anymore. Walgreens, bring back the gnome statues! Got to say that this store has a great selection of cards, candy, and beauty products. Really like that after holidays, stuff that is left over is 50% off. Great place to do last minute Christmas shopping if you are a procrastinator. See this situation happen every year.

Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: I end up going here often cause I live down the street. I guess the best way I could review it is, no one really takes any pride in working here, that's for sure. They are slow to help you, and when they do, they make sure to do it with the least work as possible. They really need to make sure their cash register guy takes showers before he comes to work. Not to be horribly mean, but the guy is filthy. You can smell him from behind the checkout, and has clear visual signs of non cleanliness. Not just once, every time I go there. He is nice though, just dirty. I bought beer there last week, and realized it expired in April, (3 months ago). Wasn't too happy about that, but I can't let myself waste beer so I drank it anyway...but wasn't happy about it.

Reviews.Author: Maly
Reviews.Content: This Walgreens pharmacy is the longest wait ever! When you call they continue to put you on hold unreal! But the employees are nice though.. Cynthia is awesome she won't even take a tip I wanted to give her. She went over and beyond to keep me posted and contact me when things were done, appreciate her awesomeness!!! Calvin is great as well!

Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: Dennis was a huge help with a photo book project that almost had me in tears from previous  failed attempts at Walmart and CVS! He set me up on a kiosk that was actually working properly, checked on me regularly and even added a coupon discount!  Now my Grandma's 90th birthday photo book is underway! Thank you Dennis for you great customer service!

Reviews.Author: Katrina
Reviews.Content: The assistant manager contacted me a couple days after the incident and apologized for the unfortunate experience. He even offered me a gift as a token of their sincere apology. I told him I wasn't looking for reimbursements, but just wanted them to be aware of what was going on. He insisted that I take it. I thought that was very nice of Walgreens to do this so I am amending my review.

Reviews.Author: Chloe
Reviews.Content: Staff has always been helpful and friendly. Last month I was waiting at the photo section for a pick up and the manager, seeing me waiting, rushed to assist me.  Today I went in to pick up some more pictures and Usman, the employee who works at the photo section, recognized me, remembered my name somehow and had the pictures all scanned and ready for me!!! I felt like a VIP, he definitely made me feel appreciated and won my loyalty!

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: It's a drug store, they have great selection and a friendly staff.  I don't really have much more I can say in this review, they're close to my house, and their prices are fair.

Reviews.Author: Ms
Reviews.Content: My shopping experience the most delightful. The staff goes above and beyond to help you. Just doing some shopping therapy and found out they have a makeup artist on staff now with there own makeup line.... 7 something.  Go Walgreen!!!. Love the card incentives. Always saving $$$

Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: After an absolutely horrible experience at CVS down the street, I went to this Walgreens and got my script filled in 12 minutes! (It took CVS 2 and a half hours and they still hadn't filled it) Thank you Rhoda for being so friendly and expedient in my time of need!

Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: I came here straight from the hospital to get the wife's prescriptions.  The Pharmacist asked for my insurance info and when I said I have Tricare she quickly said   Walgreens does not accept Tricare .    This is the insurance for both active and retired Military.  They don't accept Tricare!  Well that will be the last time I ever go into a Walgreens.  That anti Military attitude is unacceptable and I will spend my money where they appreciate the service of our active duty and retired Military!

Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: If I could give this location ZERO stars, then I would. I am beyond upset with the way the employees treated me. I went in to buy some Easter candy. There were no signs up at all. I asked the lady at the cashier to check the price for me. She did not seem like she knew what she was doing all at. ONE, she did not read description for the AD or the coupon. She just kept trying to scan the items and the coupon. She took 20 mins to check the price that didn't even come out right then she finally called the manager. The manager was also beyond rude. His reason for having NO SIGNS up for the sale,  We just opened.  Well, my question is,  Shouldn't you be prepared for your customers with questions and the correct price when you first open?  How is that even a valid excuse for your store not being prepared??? The manager also told me that an item I wanted to purchase wasn't apart of the sale when the description of the item clearly met the description of the ad. He told me that the items just weren't apart of the sale. Well, how do you know? You're not even prepared. Almost all the candy is expired also! I wonder what else is expired in this store. The manager told me that he doesn't even look at that all. So, you don't look at the expiration dates for the items in your stores? You don't ask your employees to check the expiration dates? I wasted 20 minutes at the store but I still didn't find the items listed on the ad. The manager told me he would help me find the ones that are apart of the sale but since he doesn't know what's apart of the sale how much longer would it take for him to find out?? Should I stay at the store for 1-2 hours to wait for him to find out?! I am even more upset that I asked the cashier for a coupon that was in the machine and SHE SAID NO IN A VERY RUDE MANNER then SHE RIPPED THE COUPON IN FRONT OF MY FACE AND THREW IT AWAY. I will find out the names of these employees if I EVER GO THERE AGAIN and I will complain to Walgreens for sure!!!!!!!!  The cashier who helped me is a Filipino lady and she is usually there in the morning. She is ALWAYS slow at ringing up items or helping customers.

Reviews.Author: Alyssa
Reviews.Content: All the staff I have come across has always been friendly. I've been picking up my perscriptions here for over a year now and I've never had an issue. They usually have good deals on their cosmetics and it is my go to place when other places are sold out.

Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: Worst customer service in any  pharmacy and that's crazy because Walmart has a pharmacy! Maria the pharmacist in charge has no idea what she's talking about and the guys that get your prescriptions pretty much run the show. If they're having a good day you'll get your meds on time and no problems but if they aren't you better go somewhere else. Please don't bother going to this place!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Annemarie
Reviews.Content: Courtney or Cynthia in pharmacy is amazing.    She went above and beyond.   I dropped my prescriptions off for an operation I'm having in five days.   She was amazing and I went to have them filled and she noticed one of the prescription wasn't covered under my insurance and faxed the doctor and was just really great.  I proceeded to go home and call back later in the day to see if they reached the doctor per changing one of the prescriptions to cover my insurance. I was on hold over 50 minutes and hung up on more than three times.  And during the call where I was on hold for FIFTY minutes plus I never once was told do you mind holding they just would pick up and hang up and place back on hold every time it took me off hold because I was on hold too long and rung back to alert they have a client on hold so long ring ring remember u have someone on the phone .... Absolutely heinous customer service.  Try this when the phone rings don't just pick up and click to hold try saying do you mind holding or I'm sorry one more moment or we're getting to you there's 11 guests in front of you.   TREAT PEOPLE HOW YOU WANT TO BE TREATED!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: I always get my medications from the pharmacy here and the staff always goes out of their way to get what ever you need! There is a guy at the drive through that is so nice... I think his name is Saba! He always has a smile on and helps so much!

Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: It's Walgreens, so there's not much to review. They have a pharmacy, which I don't use so I can't review. There is a redbox outside, so that's cool. If you are a crazy coupon person, you can save a ton of money buying here with their in-ad specials...   Keep your eyes peeled for their red shelf labels, those items are discontinued and usually you can get some good deals. Typically I come here when we are in a rush to get something - birthday card, case of beer, ibuprofen, allergy medicine - and it's convenient because it's on my way home from work. On average the pricing is just OK.

Reviews.Author: Sum
Reviews.Content: Haven't had any issues at this Walgreens. I get my prescriptions here and also always go here for quick shopping of items on sale or items I can get with my Walgreens rewards. My only complaint is they don't carry Physicians Formula make up. I always have to go to CVS for it. Which I don't like doing because I prefer Walgreens over cvs. That's the only real reason I gave it 4 stars, and also the pharmacy area can sometimes be very slow. Maybe unorganized.

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I am in here all the time and I have to say that I was helped today by one of the friendliest Walgreens employees I have ever encountered! This was a big guy with a red shirt that was working around 5 pm today (big built, not big fat :P). I was wandering around the store looking for a few items and quite sure I looked confused, so instead of ignoring me, he came up and helped me find what I was looking for. I had another issue at the register as it relates to my points card and when the cashier wasn't sure how to correct it, he came right up and resolved the situation in a jiffy! Super nice guy who provided excellent service!  Bumping it up a star based on that guy alone! Plus the crew at the pharmacy is usually really good too! Just don't wait in the drive thru if there is more than 1 car because it can take forever!  4 stars.

Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Went to pick up a prescription to only be told that my medicine wasn't in stock. Funny thing is they sent me an email saying it was ready. Why didn't they just call and tell me

Reviews.Author: Natalia
Reviews.Content: Came in to take a photo for passport. Some half homeless looking woman (I assumed she worked there) told me to take my earrings off. I politely asked if it would be OK to have smaller earrings and she told me  no . I told her I saw others wearing small earrings on passport photo. And she said:  it's just a picture!  Duh! It's my picture on my passport and I am not used to looking sloppy like she did (it was hard to say that she even was an employee).

Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: This review is just for the pharmacy.  I've been coming here for almost 2 years now and I have to say that the guest service has gone down the drain.    For example I went to pick up a prescription because I was sick and I told them that I would wait for it.  So after 40 minutes I finally go back to the window and no apology....the guy just tells me.   The pharmacist called u.  Really? When?  I was sitting in the chairs the whole time waiting for my name to be called.  But seriously? no apology? And way to go....blame the customer.  Geez thanks.  So not only do I have the flu but apparently I'm deaf too.  So what did she do?  whisper my name or call when a lady was crying because she was getting her flu shot? And didn't bother repeating herself?  Really? Wasted 40 minutes wishing I was home and in bed just because they couldn't waste their time calling my name.  Just because they couldn't take the extra few minutes to make sure that I got my meds on time.  Thanks a lot pharmacy staff...yeah for wasting time that I did NOT have today.
